long_description: The durable, bright Planet Bike Spok light set keeps the commuting cyclist visible up to a mile. Set includes a red taillight and a white headlight, each using a superbright LED to provide visibility up to 1 mi. Translucent case provides 220deg of visibility. Rip-and-stick straps mount lights to all shapes and sizes of handlebars, headtubes, seatposts, wheel hubs and helmets. Includes a keychain hole. Runs up to 100 hrs. on 1 CR 2032 battery (included).
short_description: The durable, bright Planet Bike Spok light set keeps the commuting cyclist visible up to a mile.
